metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16062 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
dwarf_getaranges in dwarf_getaranges.c in libdw in elfutils before2018-08-18 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-basedbuffer over-read) via a crafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16062` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

elfutils - 0.165-3ubuntu1.2
libasm1 - 0.165-3ubuntu1.2
libdw1 - 0.165-3ubuntu1.2
libelf1 - 0.165-3ubuntu1.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: elfutils package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.165-3ubuntu1.2').
